code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AddTodo=_ref=>{let{onAdd}=_ref;const[text,setText]=useState('');const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();if(text.trim()){onAdd(text.trim());setText('');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"add-todo-form",onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:text,onChange:e=>setText(e.target.value),placeholder:"Add a new todo...",className:"add-todo-input",maxLength:100}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"add-todo-btn",children:"Add Todo"})]});};export default AddTodo;
